customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Friday, September 18, 2020 5:11 PM
• Last successful execution was on 10/Sep/20
• Toggled test to "Update" status until Cypress code can be reviewed
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
Steve Mudie — Monday, September 21, 2020 9:46 AM
• Touched base with Devin and it passed the test on his local build
• I added it back to the manual pool for coverage until we can fix the odd fails and broken connection to Cypress since the last report was on the 14th
• Devin had this to say as well in case it has any bearing on what's going on here: "One thought comes to mind: there was an issue with a version of cypress we were using a few weeks back, I'm not sure if it was reverted or if it was updated, so that could potentially have caused the failures."

inline.description:
Switch to Next Step
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Open a new Mattermost Cloud instance as a sysadmin
  2. Click the 'x' button in the top-right corner of the sidebar 'Getting Started' section
  3. Click 'Remove' on the modal that pops.
  4. Go to Hamburger Menu > Getting Started
inline.expectedResult:
After Step 3: Should return to channel view, sidebar element should disappear.
After Step 4: Recommended Next Steps view should display, sidebar element should reappear
